cwipp.Plume.get_I¶

Plume.get_I(flux2D, length, *Us)¶

Finds cross-wind fireline intensity parameter I

Parameters:
  • flux2D (ndarray) – 3D (time,y,x) or 2D (y,x) array containing heat flux values [kW m-2].
  • length (float) – maximum cross-wind length of the fire over the entire timespan [m].
  • Us (float, optional) – surface wind direction [deg, relative to y axis] NOT CURRENTLY IMPLEMENTED!
Returns:

I – fireline intensity parameter [K m2 s-1]
Return type:

float
